prompt: Create a flat robot arm link plate: overall 160 mm long, 35 mm wide, 6 mm thick. Add two end holes diameter 10 mm centered 12 mm from each end. Add 6 intermediate lightening holes diameter 12 mm evenly spaced along the centerline between the end holes. Use separate sketches for outer plate and holes (REMOVE THROUGH_ALL). Add a 2 mm fillet to all outer edges of the main extrude feature. Validate with onshape_snapshot_partstudio.
